Text: Re East to East Capacity on TranswesternMichelle I was hoping to get you at least some type of bid but Tenaska is very closely reviewing where our investment dollars are going right now with everyones credit being looked as so closely and with various storage and other projects that are currently requiring investment dollars With that review it was decided by our management since we are not as well established in California as other areas it would be best not to send in any bid at this time If you have other opportunities please let me know I want to continue to build our presence on TW as the situations allow Thanks for your help PM Karenlooking forward to your bid proposals See attached file EastToEastdoc

Re East to East Capacity on TranswesternSorry Michelle I was hoping to get you at least some type of bid but Tenaska is very closely reviewing where our investment dollars are going right now with everyones credit being looked as so closely and with various storage and other projects that are currently requiring investment dollars With that review it was decided by our management since we are not as well established in California as other areas it would be best not to send in any bid at this time If you have other opportunities please let me know I want to continue to build our presence on TW as the situations allow Thanks for your help PM Karenlooking forward to your bid proposals See attached file EastToEastdoc

Capacity for JanuaryTenaska requests d capacity from W TX Pool to NNG Halley for per the following terms Demand mmbtu Commodity to W TX lateral Panhandle lateral Secondary Receipts All EOT Secondary Deliveries All EOT If you have any questions please let me know
TW transportPlease increase the MDQ of TW by to d for January at the same rates
